scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run webpack && npm run copy && npm run imageopt && npm run compress
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npx webpack --progress && npm run copy
scripts.compress: npm run gzip && npm run brotli
scripts.imageopt: echo "Optimizing images..." && npm run imageopt:png && npm run imageopt:png-placeholder && npm run imageopt:webp-png && npm run imageopt:jpg && npm run imageopt:svg
scripts.imageopt:webp-png: echo "Converting PNGs to WebP..." && find ./dist/img -type f -name '*.png' | xargs -P 32 -I {} sh -c 'npx cwebp -quiet -q 80 $1 -o "${1%.png}.webp"' _ {} \;
scripts.imageopt:png: echo "Optimizing PNGs..." && find ./dist -type f -name '*.png' | xargs -P 32 -I {} sh -c 'npx pngquant --force --skip-if-larger --quality 60-80 --output $1 --speed 1 --strip $1' _ {} \;
scripts.imageopt:png-placeholder: echo "Optimizing Placeholder PNGs..." && find ./dist -type f -name '*-placeholder.png' | xargs -P 32 -I {} sh -c 'npx pngquant --force --skip-if-larger --quality 0-1 --nofs --output $1 --speed 1 --posterize 0 --strip $1' _ {} \;
scripts.imageopt:jpg: echo "Optimizing JPEGs..." && find ./dist -type f -name '*.jpg' | xargs -P 32 -I {} sh -c 'npx jpeg-recompress -a -l 16 -m smallfry -s -n 55 -x 85 -Q $1 $1' _ {} \;
scripts.imageopt:svg: echo "Optimizing SVGs..." && find ./dist -type f -name '*.svg' | xargs -P 32 -I {} sh -c 'npx svgo -q -i $1 -o $1 -p 1 --multipass' _ {} \;
scripts.analyze: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production npx webpack --profile --progress --json > bundle-stats.json && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer bundle-stats.json
scripts.audit: npm run build && npx bundle-buddy dist/js/*.map
